value.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Sun, in the form of three defensive Chants.

Chant of Fortitute: Increases your mental save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6 and maximum life by 7%.

Chant of Fortress: Increases your physical save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your physical resistance by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2%, your armour by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and your armour hardiness by 10%.

Chant of Resistance: Increases you spell save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your fire/cold/lightning/acid resistances by 0%, 0%, 1%, 2%, 3% and reduces all damage that comes from distant enemies (3 spaces or more) by -6%.

You may only have one Chant active at a time.
value.name: Chant Acolyte

value2.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Sun, in the form of three defensive Chants.

Chant of Fortitute: Increases your mental save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6 and maximum life by 7%.

Chant of Fortress: Increases your physical save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your physical resistance by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2%, your armour by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and your armour hardiness by 10%.

Chant of Resistance: Increases you spell save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your fire/cold/lightning/acid resistances by 0%, 0%, 1%, 2%, 3% and reduces all damage that comes from distant enemies (3 spaces or more) by -5%.

You may only have one Chant active at a time.
value2.name: Chant Acolyte

value.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle slows incoming projectiles by 61%, 83%, 100%, 114%, 127%, and attempts to push all creatures other than yourself out of its radius, inflicting 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 light damage and 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 darkness damage per turn as it does so. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Circle of Warding

value2.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle slows incoming projectiles by 61%, 83%, 100%, 114%, 127%, and attempts to push all creatures other then yourself out of its radius, inflicting 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 light damage and 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 darkness damage per turn as it does so. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Circle of Warding

value.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Moons, in the form of three defensive Hymns.

Hymn of Shadows: Increases your movement speed by 0%, 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, your spell casting speed by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2% and grants 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5% evasion.

Hymn of Detection: Increases your ability to see stealthy creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and invisible creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2, and increases your critical power by 0%, 1%, 2%, 4%, 5%.

Hymn of Perseverance: Increases your resistance to stun, confusion and blinding by 7%.

You may only have one Hymn active at a time.
value.name: Hymn Acolyte

value2.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Moons, in the form of three defensive Hymns.

Hymn of Shadows: Increases your movement speed by 0%, 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, your spell casting speed by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2% and grants 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5% evasion.

Hymn of Detection: Increases your ability to see stealthy creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and invisible creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2, and increases your critical power by 0%, 1%, 2%, 4%, 5%.

Hymn of Perseverance: Increases your resistance to stun, confusion and blinding by 6%.

You may only have one Hymn active at a time.
value2.name: Hymn Acolyte

value.info_text:
Your Radiance is so powerful it burns all foes caught in it, doing up to 22, 30, 36, 41, 46 light damage (reduced with distance) to all foes caught inside.

At level 4 the light is so bright it has 7%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 22% chance to daze them for 3 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
value.name: Searing Sight

value2.info_text:
Your Radiance is so powerful it burns all foes caught in it, doing up to 22, 30, 36, 41, 46 light damage (reduced with distance) to all foes caught inside.

At level 4 the light is so bright it has 7%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 22% chance to daze them for 3 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Searing Sight

value.info_text: Fire a glowing orb of light at each enemy within your Radiance. Each orb will slowly follow its target until it connects dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 light damage to anything else it contacts along the way. When the target is reached the orb will explode dealing 100, 135, 163, 186, 207 light damage and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt. This powerful ability will dim your Radiance, reducing its radius to 1 for 5 turns.
value.name: Judgement

value2.info_text: Fire a glowing orb of light at each enemy within your Radiance. Each orb will slowly follow its target until it connects dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 light damage to anything else it contacts along the way. When the target is reached the orb will explode dealing 100, 135, 163, 186, 207 light damage and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt. This powerful ability will dim your Radiance, reducing its radius to 1 for 5 turns.
value2.name: Judgement

value.info_text: The sleeping poison of your Dart Launcher becomes potent enough to ignore immunity, and upon waking the target is slowed by -30% for 4 turns.
value.name: Dart Launcher Mastery

value2.info_text: The sleeping poison of your Dart Launcher becomes potent enough to ignore immunity, and upon waking the target is slowed by -43% for 4 turns.
value2.name: Dart Launcher Mastery

value.info_text:
Your curses bring you dark gifts. Unlocks bonus level 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 effects on all of your curses, allowing you to gain that effect when the power level of your curse reaches that level. At talent level 5, the luck penalty of cursed effects is reduced to 1.

Talent levels above 5 add bonus power levels to your curses, increasing their effects (currently 0.2, 0.2, 0.2, 0.3, 1.3).
value.name: Dark Gifts

value2.info_text:
Your curses bring you dark gifts. Unlocks bonus level 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 effects on all of your curses, allowing you to gain that effect when the power level of your curse reaches that level. At talent level 5, the luck penalty of cursed effects is reduced to 1.

Talent levels above 5 add bonus power levels to your curses, increasing their effects (currently 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.3, 1.3).
value2.name: Dark Gifts

value.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 to sleep for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Sleep ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 50% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

At talent level 5 Sleep will become contagious and has a 25% chance to spread to nearby targets each turn.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Sleep

value2.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 to sleep for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Sleep ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 80% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

At talent level 5 Sleep will become contagious and has a 25% chance to spread to nearby targets each turn.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Sleep

value.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius 7 cone into a nightmarish sleep for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

Each turn, they'll suffer 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage. This damage will not reduce the duration of the effect.

When Nightmare ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 50% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold and mind damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Nightmare

value2.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius 7 cone into a nightmarish sleep for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

Each turn, they'll suffer 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage. This damage will not reduce the duration of the effect.

When Nightmare ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 80% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold and mind damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Nightmare

value.info_text:
You call upon one of your reserve bodies, assuming its form.

A body used this way may not be healed in any way.

You can choose to exit the body at any moment by using this talent again, returning it to your reserve as it is, including any physical effects. Mental, magical and "other" effects are bound to you and will remain in effect on you.

When you reach 0 life you are forced out of it and the shock deals -136% of the maximum life of your normal body to you while reducing your movement speed by 50% and your damage by 60% for 6 turns.

The cooldown only starts when you resume your normal form.

While in another body all experience you gain still goes to you but will not be applied until you revert back.

While in another body your currently equiped objects are merged in you, you can not take them of or wear new ones.

The cooldown improves with levels in the Possess talent.

Bodies possessed:

none
value.name: Assume Form

value2.info_text:
You call upon one of your reserve bodies, assuming its form.

A body used this way may not be healed in any way.

You can choose to exit the body at any moment by using this talent again, returning it to your reserve as it is, including any physical effects. Mental, magical and "other" effects are bound to you and will remain in effect on you.

When you reach 0 life you are forced out of it and the shock deals -86% of the maximum life of your normal body to you while reducing your movement speed by 50% and your damage by 60% for 6 turns.

The cooldown only starts when you resume your normal form.

While in another body all experience you gain still goes to you but will not be applied until you revert back.

While in another body your currently equiped objects are merged in you, you can not take them of or wear new ones.

The cooldown improves with levels in the Possess talent.

Bodies possessed:

none
value2.name: Assume Form

value.info_text:
Puts the target into a deep sleep for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, rendering it unable to act. Every 66, 90, 108, 123, 137 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Slumber ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 50% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Slumber

value2.info_text:
Puts the target into a deep sleep for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, rendering it unable to act. Every 66, 90, 108, 123, 137 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Slumber ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 80% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Slumber

value.info_text:
When you fire your metalstar, your also establish a psionic bloodlink with the shrapnel still inside for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Each turn the victims are drained for 28, 38, 46, 53, 59 physical damage, half of which heals you (each additional victim healing is reduced by half).

If the victim move more than twice away from the radius of Metalstar (currently 2) the effect stops.

This damage does not break daze and increases with your Steampower.
value.name: Bloodstar

value2.info_text:
When you fire your metalstar, your also establish a psionic bloodlink with the shrapnel still inside for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Each turn the victims are drained for 28, 38, 46, 53, 59 physical damage, half of which heals you (each additional victim healing is reduced by half).

If the victim move more than twice away from the radius of Metalstar (currently 0) the effect stops.

This damage does not break daze and increases with your Steampower.
value2.name: Bloodstar

value.info_text:
While this talent is sustained, you anticipate deadly attacks against you.

Any time you would lose more than 37%, 30%, 26%, 23%, 21% of your maximum life in a single hit, you instead duck out of the way and assume a defensive posture.

This reduces the triggering damage and all further damage in the same turn by 12%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 33%.

You need 30.7 Stamina and an adjacent open tile to perform this feat (though it does not cause you to move).
value.name: Trained Reactions

value2.info_text:
While this talent is sustained, you anticipate deadly attacks against you.

Any time you would lose more than 37%, 30%, 26%, 23%, 21% of your maximum life in a single hit, you instead duck out of the way and assume a defensive posture.

This reduces the triggering damage and all further damage in the same turn by 12%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 33%.

You need 31.2 Stamina and an adjacent open tile to perform this feat (though it does not cause you to move).
value2.name: Trained Reactions

value.info_text:
Throw a knife coated with venom, doing 120% damage as nature and inflicting additional effects based on your active vile poisons (as per the Venomous Strike talent):

Numbing Poison - Reduces global speed by -1% for 5 turns.

Insidious Poison - Applies a standard poison that deals 17, 21, 27, 33, 39 nature damage over 5 turns.

Crippling Poison - Places 1 talents on cooldown for 1 turns.

Leeching Poison - Heals you for 16, 20, 27, 33, 39.

Volatile Poison - Deals a further 10, 12, 16, 20, 24 nature damage to foes in a radius 1 ball.

Using this talent puts your Venomous Strike talent on cooldown.
value.name: Venomous Throw

value2.info_text:
Throw a knife coated with venom, doing 120% damage as nature and inflicting additional effects based on your active vile poisons (as per the Venomous Strike talent):

Numbing Poison - Reduces global speed by -3% for 5 turns.

Insidious Poison - Applies a standard poison that deals 17, 21, 27, 33, 39 nature damage over 5 turns.

Crippling Poison - Places 1 talents on cooldown for 1 turns.

Leeching Poison - Heals you for 16, 20, 27, 33, 39.

Volatile Poison - Deals a further 10, 12, 16, 20, 24 nature damage to foes in a radius 1 ball.

Using this talent puts your Venomous Strike talent on cooldown.
value2.name: Venomous Throw

value.info_text:
Load venomous ammunition, causing ranged attacks to deal 0.96, 1.47, 2.32, 3.19, 4.06 nature damage and inflict numbing poison, dealing 4.81, 7.33, 12, 16, 20 nature damage over 5 turns and reducing all damage dealt by 4%.

The damage will scale with your Physical Power.
value.name: Venomous Ammunition

value2.info_text:
Load venomous ammunition, causing ranged attacks to deal 0.96, 1.47, 2.32, 3.19, 4.06 nature damage and inflict numbing poison, dealing 4.81, 7.33, 12, 16, 20 nature damage over 5 turns and reducing all damage dealt by 3%.

The damage will scale with your Physical Power.
value2.name: Venomous Ammunition

value.info_text:
Load piercing ammunition, causing attacks to reduce the target's armor and saves by -220 for 3 turns, and increasing your physical penetration by -2%.

The armor and save reduction will scale with your Physical Power.
value.name: Piercing Ammunition

value2.info_text:
Load piercing ammunition, causing attacks to reduce the target's armor and saves by -9223372036854775808 for 3 turns, and increasing your physical penetration by -5%.

The armor and save reduction will scale with your Physical Power.
value2.name: Piercing Ammunition

value.info_text:
Instantly call all of your bloated oozes to your aid.

If you have less than the maximum number of oozes allowed by the Mitosis talent, up to 1 will be created with 36, 44, 49, 53, 55 life (49%, 59%, 65%, 70%, 74% of the maximum life allowed by Mitosis).

Each ooze created will form near a random foe in sight (no more than one ooze per target) and grab its attention.

This will then allow you to channel a melee attack through your ooze to its target, doing 126%, 149%, 167%, 182%, 195% weapon damage (as Acid).
value.name: Call of the Ooze

value2.info_text:
Instantly call all of your bloated oozes to your aid.

If you have less than the maximum number of oozes allowed by the Mitosis talent, up to 1 will be created with 35, 42, 47, 50, 53 life (49%, 59%, 65%, 70%, 74% of the maximum life allowed by Mitosis).

Each ooze created will form near a random foe in sight (no more than one ooze per target) and grab its attention.

This will then allow you to channel a melee attack through your ooze to its target, doing 126%, 149%, 167%, 182%, 195% weapon damage (as Acid).
value2.name: Call of the Ooze
